name: Mr.Mabs Dress Em Up
description:
A little throwback to old school flash games and flash culture as well as the indie game community. Mix and match parts to create your version of your favorite characters. Featuring characters from Newgrounds, my own characters and tons of little secrets and surprises. 

Build it in Flash for the flash forward jam.

Works best with Ruffle on Newgrounds.com

(https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/782453)

Dress 'Em Up Gadget made for the Flash Forward Jam on Newgrounds. By @Mabelma (Mabsarts).

If you take a screenshot and post it on social media, be sure to tag @AntonioMabs and @Newgrounds and I can share your creations.

All characters are properties of their rightful owners, I just drew these badboys.
